imdb.plot outline: An ordinary man suddenly wakes up in the middle of the forest. Running out onto the road, he is accidentally hit by a detective police car. Detective runs out of the car, but discovers there is no one on the road. Then, the main hero wakes up in his bed at home and discovers injury on his body from the car wreck. Later he begins to notice that has extraordinary powers. Police detective begins her own investigation.
